snippet: Led by a charismatic, one-eyed rebel and his lover, an outlaw gang roams the Brazilian badlands in the 1920s and ’30s.
abstract: Andrea Wulf reviews book Backlands by Victoria Shorr.
lead_paragraph: Led by a charismatic, one-eyed rebel and his lover, an outlaw gang roams the Brazilian badlands in the 1920s and ’30s.

headline.print_headline: As if Each Day Were Their Last
